title: First Blog Post
author: Paul Niemczyk
body: These student devs keep getting younger and smarter

title: Time
author: Khale
body: Time is a strange thing. Does it all exist simultaneously at once and we are simply a slice of it ever moving forward at pace which we call seconds? Or is it less than that? We can truly never know as we do not exist outside of time and to escape it would be near impossible.

title: Test of id
author: Khale
body: Id should be 2 though it will display after 3 Edit: Added a sort to the display for id descending.
